name: Innkeeper Prototype
description:
Update for July:

Framework for floors and walls started, hero death tracker, Special ability framework in place but not yet implemented.  Edit: Fixed hero death bug

In Innkeeper you manage a fantasy Inn, setting up quests for heroes to complete and selling the spoils to build your quest hub. This is a very early prototype, shared among a few friends to mess around with Unity. Essentially the framework simulation is working and interactive at this stage, with much to add and a whole lot of work to make the sim interesting. I'm aiming to update progress monthly.

Click on the quest boards to create quests.

Placeholder graphics from:

Open Game Art: Kenney, Nemisys, Redshrike, Sharm

DeviantArt: Ayene-chan
